title: Leeds United Live: Brentford 1-1 Leeds - BBC News
summary: all the action and reaction as leeds united take on championship rivals brentford .
wood starts for leeds with diagouraga on the bench .
saunders gives brentford lead after wood goes off with injury .
mustapha carayol equalises to move leeds to 14th .

documents.title: good eveningbrentford 1-1 leeds
text: another draw then for leeds united , but chris wood 's possible injury will be a worry for them .
he will be assessed tomorrow after going down with a tight hamstring .
it was an improved second-half performance and leeds deserved their equaliser after some decent build up , but the way they are starting games must cause steve evans some worry .
you can listen to our post-match interview with steve evans and toumani diagouraga here .
we 'll be back on saturday for the fa cup clash with bolton .
until then , thank you very much for joining us and have a good evening .

documents.title: more from evansbrentford 1-1 leeds
text: `` i thought the second antenucci shout was a definite penalty , '' steve evans told bbc radio leeds .
`` but as i 've said before , we 're leeds united and we do n't get fair decisions !
`` i thought diagouraga was outstanding .
you could see within two minutes of him coming on that he was composed .
he will do very well for leeds united .
he only trained yesterday with the boys for the first time but we look forward to working with him , he 's a great addition to the squad . ''

documents.title: reaction from steve evansbrentford 1-1 leeds
text: `` it 's always a blow when you lose chris wood , especially after the change he made at the weekend , '' steve evans told bbc radio leeds .
`` it was definitely a game of two halves .
it was a poor goal to concede .
we backed off and there were three or four errors in the build up .
we can definitely practice and make ourselves better in those areas .
`` we did n't start carayol because his performance had been down and chris wood had such a good game against bristol .
we changed the formation at half-time and i think from then on in we did better .
we can come away thinking why did n't we win the match ? ''

documents.title: have leeds improved ? brentford 1-1 leeds
text: i think there has been a progression but not one to where we all can see it and think `` wow , look how much we 've come on . ''
we 've still got inconsistencies but the squad and the additions have been positive on the whole team .
i do n't think we 're seeing the best out of stuart dallas or luke murphy - it 's all about putting the ball in the back of the net and we 're not doing it consistently enough .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: noel on the formationbrentford 1-1 leeds
text: brentford have very lively players who are all comfortable on the ball .
when we changed the formation we were pressing them higher , which seemed to work .
we restricted them and we were the more dominant side .
i think that was the key because that it what brought us into the game and gave us the goal we deserved .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: more from noelbrentford 1-1 leeds
text: you want them to be able to deliver for a full 90 minutes .
it 's a fair result , today , but you do wonder why they ca n't start off games the want they do the second half .
if they did i 'm sure we would be winning more games than we are drawing but you ca n't turn up 45 minutes into the game and expect to beat a very good brentford side .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: noel on today 's performancebrentford 1-1 leeds
text: if they had gone about their job in the right way in the first 45 minutes they might have won .
the passing and movement was n't as crisp as brentford 's but we got the reaction we really wanted in the second half .
it was a very average first half performance once again but i think the draw is the fair result .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: full time : brentford 1-1 leeds
text: leeds have managed to avoid another defeat but once again , they 've had to go behind to really get into the game .
still , a point is a point , and it sees leeds move up to 14th in the championship as it stands .
let us know your thoughts , leeds fans , by tweeting us @ twitterid
and 1,632 leeds fans go bonkers .
great finish carayol , some pace on that # brentfordfc 1-1 # lufc @ twitterid

documents.title: brentford 1-1 leeds
text: there 's another great save from david button as mustapha carayol runs and sets up souleymane doukara .
it 's a stinging shot from about 27 yards but button does incredibly well to keep it out .

text: that 's close for brentford as they worm their way through the leeds defence but the shot is scuffed .

text: brentford make the last substitution of the game as john swift makes way for nico yennaris .

text: mustapha carayol nicks the ball in the midfield , before lewis cook loses control and brentford snatch it back .
it could be a nervy last few minutes .

text: that 's a proper finish from mustapha carayol , who has come on , got a yellow and netted a goal in the past ten minutes .
there was some good build up from liam bridcutt and souleymane doukara , before carayol bundled home from the edge of the area .

documents.title: steve evans on the transfer windowbrentford v leeds
text: steve evans has been speaking to bbc radio leeds about his targets in the last week of the transfer window .
evans confirmed that he is targeting a striker , ideally `` someone who can play on either side . ''
he also confirmed that there is an opportunity for tommaso bianchi to return to italy on a loan basis , with a view to a permanent move .
on new signing toumani diagouraga , evans said : `` he is purposeful and powerful and our supporters will recognise that .
he will compliment what we have . ''

documents.title: noel on the first halfbrentford 1-0 leeds
text: we have to look after the ball better .
there are too many loose passes out there and we have to be more productive with the ball in possession .
saunders has ran from the edge of his own deep to leeds united 's deep without anybody threatening him .
questions have to be asked about how a player can run the length of the field and score without any challenges .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half time : brentford 1-0 leeds
text: brentford have had the better of the first half and they take a deserved lead into half time .
leeds have looked more lively than they did on saturday - it would have been difficult for them to look much worse - but once again , they find themselves a goal down at the break .

documents.title: breakinggoal saunders : brentford 1-0 leeds
text: leeds have gone from attacking to being a goal down within the space of a minute , which sort of sums up their season .
liam bridcutt knocked the ball straight into sam saunders path , and saunders raced unchallenged down the middle .
to slide it into the bottom corner .
he got through leeds ' midfield completely unchallenged and marco silvestri was beaten all ends up .
not great .

documents.title: as it standsbrentford v leeds
text: right now , leeds are 16th in the championship - 11 points clear of the drop zone and 11 points away from the final play-off position .
a win tonight would lift them within a point of brentford , who are currently 10th .
with brentford scoring just once in their last three games , and leeds ' away record making for happier reading than their home one , can they make a late surge up the table ?

documents.title: head to headbrentford v leeds
text: look away , leeds fans - leeds have n't beaten brentford in their last five matches at griffin park .
the bees ended a run of four straight defeats on saturday with a 3-1 victory over preston north end .
leeds have yet to register a victory away from elland road this season , and they have n't scored a first-half goal against brentford for five games .
in fact , leeds have won just three of their 14 league trips to griffin park .
it could be a tough one tonight !

documents.title: last time outbrentford v leeds
text: these two sides have a colourful history - it was last year at griffin park that massimo cellino was ejected from the directors box for `` over-enthusiasm . ''
cellino went and joined the fans for a hot dog as he saw his club lose 2-0 .
the last time these two sides met was at elland road in september , where mirco antenucci managed to rescue a point for leeds .
brentford led at half-time after marco djuricin scored , but antenucci , brought on as a sub , scored from 25 yards to spare leeds ' blushes .

documents.title: popey on antenuccibrentford v leeds
text: i think his days are numbered .
for some leeds fans he will never recover from the injury episode last season , but he had an ability to change the game .
we do n't have anyone quite like him but is his future at leeds united ?
i would say no .
i think it 's about his age , more than his ability .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: `` i need competition around the squad '' brentford v leeds
text: everyone 's favourite bearded one , mirco antenucci , is out of contract at leeds at the end of the season .
antenucci has made several appearances for leeds off the bench in the last few weeks , and steve evans wants him to fight for his place in the first team .
`` the one thing mirco knows and respects is that to get a new contract , you have to force yourself into the side and be the number one striker , '' evans said .
`` if you are third or fourth choice , it 's unlikely you will get a new contact .
performances , not reputation , are the only thing that will get you a contract . ''

documents.title: wood , doukara , or both ? brentford v leeds
text: there was no doubt that chris wood lifted a flat game for leeds on saturday when he made his comeback after four weeks .
wood set up souleymane doukara 's goal - his third in four matches - but after an uninspiring first half , is steve evans tempted to start them together more often ?
`` we have seen them play very well together and we 've seen them not so good together , '' evans told bbc radio leeds .
`` i look at their performance at wolves , where doukara came off the bench .
`` he not only changed the game but his play with chris was outstanding .
i think they can play together and i think they compliment each other really well . ''

documents.title: `` it was like going to the dentist '' brentford v leeds
text: no-one was impressed with leeds united 's performance against bristol city at the weekend .
leeds were flat for the first 45 minutes and were lucky not to go behind , before soulemayne doukara rescued them with a goal .
`` the first half was like 45 minutes waiting at the dentist , '' steve evans told bbc radio leeds after the game .
`` it was flat all round the club this week , maybe with sam going .
i was heavily critical of the first half , then i told them about what it means to grind out a 1-0 win .
`` i said at half time , if we score , we 're not losing the game .
we have a clean sheet - let 's get used to delivering clean sheets at elland road . ''

documents.title: noel on today 's line-upbrentford v leeds
text: i like the 4-4-2 idea .
doukara has three in four , wood was instrumental in the goal on saturday and he looked like the player that is pivotal to how we play .
wood is very important in how we play .
i worry that they are too similar - i think antenucci is more natural in dropping back and he has pace that wood and doukara lack .
i think antenucci would compliment either one of them alongside him .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: two in a row ? brentford v leeds
text: good evening , and welcome to tonight 's live text commentary of brentford v leeds united .
it 's been a better couple of days for the whites , who registered their first win in six games on saturday .
they 've also added former brentford midfielder toumani diagouraga - that 's a fun one to type - to their ranks on a two-and-a-half year deal .
can leeds make it back-to-back wins ?
keep an eye on us here while you listen to our commentary on 92.4 fm , dab and freeview channel 719 to find out ,
